amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3742 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3742 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3748. to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3742 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3742 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
